item.description: MassBaySailors after the Boat Show annual Social Monday is a holiday, so no worries about getting up early for work. Yup, we do it every year after the close of the last day of the NE Boat show. A bunch of MassBaySailors get together to talk about the show and the upcoming sailing season. Join us if you can! Where; MJ O'Connors Irish Pub 425 Summer St South Boston, MA 02210 (617) 532-4600 It's in the Weston Hotel 1st floor right next to the Boston Convention Ctr. http://www.urbanspoon...
item.name: MassBaySailors, after the NE Boat Show Social! MJ O'Connor's
